item.title: Books I read and liked
item.description: Since 2018, I share the books I read and liked in this section (when I don’t really like a book I just stop reading it). As this section is a personal one, most of its content is written in French. 2019 Les Furtifs   Alain Damasio   roman   Passage à Médiapart en avril 2019   Troisième roman d'Alain Damasio, troisième claque ! Avec les furtifs, l'auteur nous amène sur la trace d'une espèce qui n'en laisse pas.

item.title: Movies and Series I watched and liked
item.description: Since late 2018, I share the movies ans series I watched and liked in this section. Note that images are links to the movies/series webpage available on Rotten Tomatoes. 2020 2019 2018
